reviews.text:
The food was okay, we didn‚Äôt really find it to be anything special. When we got the food, the fries tasted as if they were sitting for a while.

We went on a weekend so the seating was packed, it was hard to find an available table. And nobody really goes around cleaning them, so if the person before you didn‚Äôt pick up the table will have their trash for you to clean.

I was warned not to go, but I really wanted to experience the original Nathan's in Coney Island. I should have listened. We waited over 30 minutes for just a couple of hotdogs and some mac and cheese bites, which was baffling. After all that waiting, the food was completely subpar and a massive letdown.
To make it worse, we spent over $60 for this. It's not worth the time, the money, or the hype. You're just paying for a name. I would not recommend this to anyone. Save your money and go somewhere else.
Iconic really good food

Hot dogs are good!. Service as well. Expensive though‚Ä¶
Gray‚Äôs Papaya offers a similar experience and you spend half.

J‚Äôai achet√© un fried clamb sandwich boat √† 22$. La pr√©paration du sandwich a √©t√© minable. Il manquait la sauce et le coleslaw. Je suis all√© le demander et j‚Äôai obtenu des toutes petites portions de coleslaw dans des petits pots en plastique. Je n‚Äôai pas eu des fruits de mer √† la panure mais l‚Äôinverse. Je les cherche encore tellement il y avait de la panure. Aucun go√ªt ! C‚Äô√©tait m√™me un peu aigre, peut √™tre √† cause de la friture ! Bref tr√®s d√©cevant et un prix exorbitant pour la qualit√© de cette nourriture !! Avis aux amateurs ! Et le service apr√®s vente s‚Äôest fait en trainant des pieds ! Et dire que j‚Äôai laiss√© un tip √† 10% !!! Bref tout a √©t√© lamentable üëé
Atenci√≥n r√°pida y muy amables a pesar de estar muy concurrido. Muchas opciones de comidas y bebidas, lamentablemente nada sin gluten. Toilette muy limpios
Stale buns
Average hot dogs. Fries are bad. Long waiting time. Very overpriced.
S√≥lo por la historia del local ya merece la pena comer all√≠. Pero hay que reconocer que los hot dog estaban muy buenos.
Great one!
La location √® stupenda, l'hot dog buono!

Thisis a fast food place.
Food is yummy. Vareity of topping for hotdogs are good.
The food was terrible and the cashiers attitude was very bad.
Dlouhe cekani. Nakonec nekompletni objednavka. Hot dog byl lepsi ze stanku u central parku. Absolutne p≈ôece≈àov√°n√° zalezitost. Nicmene Milk shake byl skvely
This place been here for over 100 years!  That is saying something - get the Coney Dog and a beer and enjoy the boardwalk atmosphere!

My dad and I have been to this place and that to order two hotdogs. The service was wonderful that there were many people on the line. The atmosphere is that this place is very famous because of the annual Nathan's hotdog eating contest there, and also that it was a nice sunny day.

I don‚Äôt know why people have negative things to say about such an iconic landmark. The $5.99 hot dog was, in my opinion, reasonable for being such a tourist attraction. The hot dog was big enough and tasted great.
El hot dog estuvo bueno pero no hay gran diferencia. Quiz√°s agregarle el chili o queso para algo distinto. No tiene muchas mesas para comer en el sitio.
Hamburger e hot dog top. Salse a libero consumo, tavoli vista oceano . Servizio un po‚Äô lento

Non lo so, sinceramnete avevo alte aspettative che per√≤ sono rimaste un po' deluse, mi aspettavo qualcosa di memorabile, alla fine sono classici hot dog, cio√® buoni ma non partirei apposta da Manhattan per mangiarli. Servizio un po' svogliato nonostante non ci fosse molta gente.
I had onion rings and they weren‚Äôt that bad.

Had a chili dog. Was done perfect and tasted just how I remember.
Also had a steak and cheese hero. Almost couldn't finish it but it was so good I had to!
Irrinunciabile un hot dog a Coney island.

Love their Hells Kitchen burger. The best item in their menu. Yummy.

Beer pricey.

Wish more seating but can take your food to a boardwalk bench if can find one empty.

Recommended.
Mal servicio

Coney Island is a must-see for anyone who wants to really experience New York. It‚Äôs also a must to taste the famous hot dogs, born here more than 100 years ago. My expectations were high, and I have to say the experience was positive: tasty hot dogs and excellent fries. Recommended!

Yeah, I know everyone goes here. And some people think the hot dogs are a little on the skimpy side, but true Frankfurter lovers will appreciate the taste of these dogs. And what an iconic location, right on the boardwalk with picnic tables protected from the sun's rays by yellow Nathan's umbrellas. My buddy got a dog, spicy chicken sandwich with Nashville hot sauce and onion rings. The rings were a little lukewarm but he reported everything else was certainly up to par!

Cibo molto buono, ho amato le patatine fritte (sembrano poche ma sono enormi). L‚Äôhotdog √® classico e va assolutamente provato. Inoltre di fianco al locale ci sono dei tavolini in cui potersi sedere che sono perfetti per quando c‚Äô√® una giornata di sole
Tr√®s bon hot-dog ! (Un poil cher, mais √† go√ªter au moins une fois)
Can be slow, long lines, and a little pricy for a hotdog but it‚Äôs convenient

The hot dogs weren't bad and milkshake is pretty good, a bit overhyped!!!
I was expecting a lot more than your average hot dog. It's a great atmosphere though down by the beach.
Tr√®s bon endroit pour se restaurer rapidement. Des tables sont disponibles aussi √† l‚Äôext√©rieur. Large choix de plats et boissons ü•§
Nothing beats eating a Nathan's Hot Dog on the Coney Island Boardwalk in summer. Well maybe riding the Cyclone after ... If you dare!

I haven‚Äôt been at Coney Island in a while, so I was excited to eat at Nathan‚Äòs hotdog again‚Ä¶ the pricing is understandable because of where I‚Äôm at, but charging that price and it being a regular hotdog and not that Nathan‚Äôs hotdog is disappointing.
El mejor pancho de la vida

Per me √® sopravvalutato, comunque il servizio √® veloce e ben organizzato. Siamo andati in un sabato di agosto e nonostante ci fosse un bel po di gente, ci hanno servito il nostro hotdog in 10 minuti

We had such high expectations for visiting the original Nathan‚Äôs Famous in Coney Island, but sadly left very disappointed.

The hotdogs were small and overpriced‚Äîover $5.50 for something that felt more like a snack than a meal. For comparison, a regular Nathan‚Äôs hotdog is about a quarter of the size of a Costco hotdog (which includes a drink for $1.50!)‚Äîand Costco‚Äôs tastes much better too.

There are several ways Nathan‚Äôs could improve the experience: offer larger hotdogs, use better-quality bread, provide more complimentary topping options, and ensure cleaner, more comfortable seating for customers.

We‚Äôre glad we checked it off our New York to-do list‚Äîbut we definitely won‚Äôt be returning.
Difficult to find a place to sit to eat.   Corn dog bites vs chili cheese fries were delicious!
Worst "food" on the planet!!! Never go there!
Went here on national hot dog day. They had 5¬¢ hotdogs. Staff was great. Food was good

This place is popular due to excellent promoting. It's a hotdog. A little tastier than the ones you might find at your local market, but not that big of a difference to really get excited about. Eat it for nostalgia.
I got their famous classic hot dog and the bacon one, with fries. I wasn't that into it.

I tried their famous Nathan's hot dogs, but wasn't impressed. Overrated in my humble opinion.
Quite small hot dogs, tasteless, not even warm, each costs $5.99.
Same goes for jalape√±o fries with bacon, too greasy and small portion.
Their soft drinks are expensive, up to $4.99.
Waiting time on summer weekends goes up to 15-20min.
Seating area is usually packed.
There are much better food options in Coney Island for the same price.

Lindo! Fuimos a almorzar, la comida no es nada de otro mundo, los hotdogs son chicos, las papas fritas est√°n bien. Lo mas lindo de ese local es la vista y las mesas frente al mar. Precios elevados justifican el lugar

Famous board walk never fails. Great service, music, and tasty eats. I grabbed their great values authentic Nathan fries with barbecue sauce. They have plenty of selections including a catch of the day seafood menu!

We really enjoyed our stop at Nathan‚Äôs Famous Hot Dogs on our trip to Coney Island. The line for food is pretty long all the time but they do have a self service screen with a different queue - this is much quicker and great if you just want hotdogs/sides.

It‚Äôs all made fresh to order and tastes great. It‚Äôs a must-do if you‚Äôre popping to Coney Island, I LOVED the onion rings!!

Pro tip: theres a self order line that gets super long and everyone thinks you need to stand there for hot dogs. Go to the regular line you can get dogs there! We did and it was very quick! On the 4th of July! Hot dog was just fine, the fries were very good. Would come back for fries

Yesterday, we tried burgers, fries, and shrimp here. And, we loved it,

The burger was just perfect. Just the right amount of everything, right meat and greens.

Ordering was easy and quick. Wait-time was just a few minutes.

What deserves a special mention?
Their menu is rich, and there's something for everyone. Whether you are a meat lover or vegetarian, you're not gonna be disappointed. Price is also reasonable.

What could be better?
Nothing, they are doing a great job.

Nathan‚Äôs Famous, a Coney Island icon since 1916, delivers a quintessential boardwalk experience. Known for its legendary hot dogs, the menu also features juicy burgers, crispy fries, and fresh seafood. The vibrant atmosphere, with its retro signage and bustling counter, captures the spirit of New York‚Äôs seaside tradition. A must-visit for classic American fare with a side of history!

The fame is what drew me.  The food is terrible!!

If your nostalgic about have a famous Nathan‚Äôs hotdog on the board walk.  Give it a try!

If you‚Äôre looking for good food try something else!!!

Achei o restaurante ok, √© isso. Claro que √© um restaurante americano de fast food, mas n√£o d√° para ser mais do que isso.
Chegamos cedo e estava sem fila. Apesar disso o pedido demorou para sair. Pedi uma por√ß√£o de batata frita normal, e parecia que eu estava comendo batatas murchas. Estavam bem molhadas de √≥leo e nada crocantes. Os pre√ßos dos lanches tamb√©m eram um pouco acima da m√©dia, mas entendo que o motivo √© a localiza√ß√£o.
O atendimento foi bem devagar.

Comi aqui por falta de op√ß√£o mas deve agradar algumas pessoas. O restaurante tinha mesas externas para sentar, era uma boa op√ß√£o no sol forte.
We took hot dogs and cheese fries and honestly it‚Äôs nothing special, the fries are not very tasty and the waiting for the order to arrive is too much for a simple hot dog.

Nathan‚Äôs at the pier was a disappointment. I waited 45 minutes for my hot dog. After all it was salty and the fries soft and tasteless. I suggest to go to another place there. The location is nice though, right at the pier.

Nathan‚Äôs Famous a Coney Island √® un luogo che porta con s√© una lunga storia, essendo il creatore del celebre hot dog newyorchese. Tuttavia, quella che una volta era una tappa obbligata per chiunque visitasse Coney Island, oggi sembra aver perso gran parte del suo fascino originale.

L‚Äôhot dog, al costo di 7 dollari, lascia un po‚Äô di amaro in bocca. Considerando la qualit√† complessiva, il prezzo risulta eccessivo e ingiustificato. La fama di questo posto non si traduce pi√π in un prodotto che valga davvero la spesa. Ci si aspetterebbe qualcosa di pi√π, soprattutto da un locale con una tale reputazione storica.

Purtroppo, Nathan‚Äôs √® diventato ormai una meta prevalentemente turistica, dove si paga pi√π per il nome e l‚Äôesperienza di dire "ci sono stato", che per un pasto davvero memorabile. La qualit√† del cibo sembra essere passata in secondo piano, il che √® un peccato, considerando l‚Äôimportanza culturale e gastronomica che questo locale ha avuto nel corso degli anni.
Part of the joy of visiting Coney Island and Luna Park in Brooklyn New York, is grabbing a couple world famous Nathan's hot dogs on the Boardwalk. The very best dogs, in an iconic setting!

Heuuuuu... OK, commen√ßons par les plus ! Coney Island j'adore !!! D√®s qu'il fait beau √† NY je file l√†-bas (c'est direct en m√©tro). Et je vois des gens se ruer chez Nathan's. Et bien autant que possible essayez une autre adresse car apr√®s une longue attente pour commander (commande sur tablette ou en direct), vous d√©couvrirez une cuisine tr√®s moyenne. Je n'ai absolument pas aim√© les fameux Hot-dogs et le plat de poulet n'a pas eu plus de succ√®s. Bref, √ßa d√©panne, c'est extr√™mement bien plac√© et puis c'est tout. Bonne balade.

Hot dog chili cheese pazzesco!!!!!!!
Peccato che sia un po' troppo piccolo..... Ne avrei mangiati 3!!!!! Locale di fronte alla spiaggia di Coney Island, non fatevi spaventare dalla coda perch√© sono molto veloci (una per ordinare su pc ed una direttamente agli operatori).

Title: A Classic Bite at Coney Island's Icon

Review:

On a sweltering summer, my wife and I visited Nathan's Famous Boardwalk Stall at 1205 Riegelmann Boardwalk in Coney Island. The stall was crowded, but we only had to wait a few minutes to order.

We ordered the legendary hot dogs, crispy onion rings, and cheesy fries. The hot dogs were delicious, and the onion rings and fries were perfectly cooked. The staff was friendly and efficient.

Overall, we had a great experience at Nathan's Famous Boardwalk Stall. The food was delicious, the service was good, and the prices were reasonable. We would recommend this place to anyone visiting Coney Island.

Had heard all about Nathan's Hot dogs and my experience wasn't all it cracked up to be. Hot dog was good just nothing amazing or ground breaking. Staff looked like they wanted to be anywhere else and were quite unhelpful bar one member of staff I believe Dania? Who helped answer some questions for me.
Can't beat the location though

The hot dog is very good. The fish and chips were soaks in oil, and the fries were overcooked and tasted, not fresh.
The atmosphere in the boardwalk is always great.

Impossibile non notare la sua vistosa insegna sul lungomare di coney island.
Il must √® l‚Äôhotdog, ma il men√π comprende tantissime altre alternative. Prezzi contenuti.

Nathan's Famous Hot Dogs in Coney Island is a true institution, not just for New Yorkers, but for hot dog lovers everywhere. Located on the corner of Surf and Stillwell Avenues, this legendary hot dog stand has been in operation since 1916 and continues to be a must-see for anyone visiting Coney Island. With its historic charm and unmistakable flavors, Nathan's Famous offers a dining experience that goes beyond just a meal.

Food Quality:
Nathan's hot dogs are renowned for their superior quality and delicious taste. Made with a secret recipe that has remained unchanged for over a century, their hot dogs are juicy, flavorful and with that perfect combination of crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. Classic accompaniments, such as mustard, ketchup, onions and sauerkraut, further enhance the authentic flavor of these iconic hot dogs.

Menu variety:
In addition to the famous hot dogs, Nathan's offers a wide range of typical American dishes. Among these, chicken nuggets, burgers, fish and chips and cheese-covered fries stand out. The famous ‚Äúcrinkle-cut fries‚Äù are a must-try, crunchy and perfectly salted. For those looking for something different, the menu also includes delicious fresh seafood and fish sandwiches. There is no shortage of sweet options, such as classic ice creams and milkshakes.

Atmosphere and Environment:
Nathan's location in Coney Island adds a unique charm to the dining experience. The venue, with its vintage look and illuminated signs, evokes a sense of nostalgia and tradition. Eating a Nathan's hot dog along the famous Coney Island boardwalk, overlooking Luna Park and the boardwalk, is an experience that perfectly captures the essence of this historic beach destination.

Customer care:
The staff at Nathan's is efficient and friendly, despite the high volume of customers that crowd the place, especially during the summer. The service is fast, even during the busiest moments, thanks to well-organized management and a streamlined order system. The staff is always ready to answer questions and offer recommendations on dishes on the menu.

Price:
Nathan's prices are reasonable and accessible, considering the quality of the food and the historical importance of the place. The hot dogs and other menu items offer great value, making Nathan's a convenient option for a tasty meal in Coney Island.

I had never been to Coney Island before, but somehow it felt nostalgic. Waited in line for a classic Nathan‚Äôs hot dog. They menu actually had a lot of options, but I went for the classic. The best part is finding a shady spot at a picnic table and enjoying your hot dog in this atmosphere. Would definitely recommend.

Eravamo a Coney Island e abbiamo deciso di provare i loro famosi hot dog. Devo dire che sono buoni, anche se non indimenticabili, mentre le patatine sono davvero gustose. Il servizio per√≤ √® lentissimo e un po' confusionario, attesa in fila di oltre mezz'ora. Poco personale presente e molto lento nell'evadere  gli ordini. Rapporto qualit√† prezzo nella media per New York.

Il luogo √® veramente caratteristico, vicino alle giostre del Luna Park, sembra di essere in un'altra epoca! L'hot dog √® buono, 6$ per un hot dog classico senza nulla, 7/8$ con aggiunte. Servizio veloce vista la coda lunghissima di persone

Vai a fare un giro a Coney Island vuoi non provare gli hot dog da Nathan's? Ammetto di aver ragionato al contrario in verit√†. Hot dog buoni ma sono pur sempre hot dog. Semplice come deve essere. Ambientazione un plus. Contento di aver fatto un giro.
